attributes.action: Implement a stricter unacceptable behaviour policy for MPs in Parliament.
attributes.background: I'm heartily fed up of being embarrassed by our MPs behaving like schoolchildren by booing, jeering at and laughing at speakers in the Commons. They should remember that they represent others, and should be banned from the Commons without pay or expenses for such unacceptable behaviour.

rejection.details:
If you would like a stricter code of conduct for MPs, you could sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125275

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121149

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122714

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129461
